summary: I’m currently feeling really sorry for the Andi Mack fandom that has to go through this today, and it’s saddening of course. We...
body:
I’m currently feeling really sorry for the Andi Mack fandom that has to go through this today, and it’s saddening of course. We all know what we’re talking about right? The show getting downright cancelled after its third season, with continuous warnings beforehand?

On June 21st, the same day Toy Story 4 opens in theaters, we will rise altogether and give Andi Mack everything that it deserves: strong views for its final episode(s), our praise for the show being able to provide everything and to showcase itself on televisions across the U.S and the globe, and our love and support, through fan-art, appreciation posts about its LGBT+ and racial representation, and much more.

What ever it takes, let’s give it all!

ao3: miairieirn

tags: im not surporsed that its canceled
its just a bit shocking that the show is actually gone
summary: It’s been really lovely to be apart of a fandom with so many amazing and talented people, before i continue i’d like to say this...
body:
It’s been really lovely to be apart of a fandom with so many amazing and talented people, before i continue i’d like to say this isn’t a goodbye, i don’t think i could ever say good by to this fandom. we’ve witnessed history being made together and that is such a huge thing, i could never leave this behind. instead this is me saying thank you to the content creators in this fandom and the people who have supported andi mack.

i could go on about how much i love the show, which i will later on but, andi mack will always hold a special place in my heart and i’m not ready to give it up yet or say goodbye. andi mack isn’t over just because the show is cancelled, the friendom will still be here making content for it and giving support to the cast. the show may be ending but our love for it, hopefully doesn’t.

the andi mack fandom is the first fandom i’ve been actively apart of and made content for and can i just say it’s been the best, we’ve all watched the cast and the characters grow as people and i don’t think i’d have picked lovelier people than all of you to do that with so thank you to everyone.

i haven’t gotten the chance to talk to everyone in the friendom and some people i’ve probably just talked to in passing, but i’ve seen your urls around, ive though about talking to some of you (i’m terrible at starting conversation) i’ve seen your art and i’ve read your fics and i’m so thankful for all of you, you’ve helped keep the fandom alive.

it’s been really amazing being apart of this friendom (not a goodbye) i feel like i’ve found family and friendship in so many of you, so i can’t wait to watch the last few episodes with you all and probably watch history being made once again.

- thank you terri, peyton, sofia, joshua, lilan, trent, asher, lauren, luke, emily and everyone else who’s been apart of the cast for making andi mack a reality <3

blog.name: buffy-driscool
blog.title: Change The Game
blog.description: 18 year old Aussie who really loves this Disney show | she/her | an amateur artist and writer

tags: it has been a great journey
summary: Andi Mack will always be in my heart
body:
Andi Mack will always be in my heart

I’m away right now without the ability to continuously check through tumblr or social media but I just found out that Andi Mack is officially cancelled. I can’t say I’m surprised but I’m still undeniably upset by this news. I am, however, grateful for the great three seasons that we did have. This show has been an incredible one and I know in my heart that it will continue to be watched and loved, it will continue to inspire young and old, and it will continue to be the source of many smiles and laughter.

I just want to say (eventhough this will probably never be seen) that it has been a pleasure to see this story come about on my screen, to see the topics that were tackled and the fun that was had. I want to say thank you to all the cast and crew for getting to know these wonderful characters and for portraying them in such an amazing beautiful way. I want to say thank you to the captain of this project, Terri Minsky for creating this show, these characters, these story lines, and for taking a chance and pushing for diversity. I want to say thank you to the rest of you guys who are always so incredibly nice, passionate and lovely and ready to enthusiasticly ramble about this show and create beautiful art for it. Thank you for loving this show as much as I do.

The show may be over (after the finale) but it will never be over for me personally. I’m still going to watch and love it as I always have.

To all the cast members, especially the kids who I have grown to love so much, I look forward to seeing what else is ahead in your future. I look forward to seeing you smash every job/project that you do. It has been an honour to see you grow and become the talented, intelligent and kind little humans that you are. I can’t help but feel proud.

I can’t wait to see the final episodes and to see how this story wraps up, I’m sure they will be incredible.

thank you from the bottom of my heart for Andi Mack.

I’m going to tag @joshua-rush because you are the only one who may see this. So if you see this josh, know how thankful I am for you. Also thanks for being so active and always interacting with us fools. It’s been fun.

blog.name: bmgmw
blog.title: it's all about perspective
blog.description: 27. F. Bi. Hodgepodge of AM, GoT, ODAAT, AWAE, GMW, B99, TGP and whatever else I end up getting sucked into 📺ask box open :)

question: wait AM is cancelled?
answer:
Yup. Disney tried to do some PR spinning by announcing the air dates of the remaining episodes as the show “airing its final episodes”, which makes it seem like a planned ending. But based on the cast and crew mentioning in the past they’d be down to an S4 and the cast currently supporting the paper crane project, I’m pretty sure they were left in limbo at the end of S3 production (though I’m sure based on Disney’s recent history may have had a gut feeling) and now are officially cancelled.

It’s like GMW again. The only thing that makes this one a little better is that AM has a higher chance of resolving storylines by the end of the season, vs GMW which desperately needed the 4th season to resolve shit (Jacobs gambled and lost)

blog.description:
sadie. 23. she/they. lesbian. here to talk about tv & give advice. hoodie enthusiast. fandom mother.

main blog & twitter: sadieannerue instagram: dailymackcast, andimackpapercraneproject

summary: Everything is so bittersweet right now, but I feel so lucky to be a part of such a close community of fans. The fact that for...
body: Everything is so bittersweet right now, but I feel so lucky to be a part of such a close community of fans. The fact that for the last two weeks, the cast and crew of the show have been seeing and feeling so much love as a result of the paper crane project makes me feel so warm. Knowing that they are seeing these messages right now, when it really means the most to them, is so special. The fact that for the last two weeks, they have shown me an endless amount of love and support as a result of the project is unbelievable and means absolutely everything to me. The feeling of mutual love and support and appreciation between the people who make this show and the people who watch this show is something so rare, and I will always be so thankful that I am a part of this.
